title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.52 - Drivers required in report accidents before leaving terminal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1225.52 - Drivers required in report accidents before leaving terminal

State Regulations

The driver of an automotive vehicle involved in any
accident in a truck terminal, causing personal injury or property damage, shall, before leaving the terminal at which the accident occurred, give his
name, address and a full report of the accident to the
superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1225.52

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
